options.text: They use Asana for project management tasks.
options.why: Widely adopted for task tracking and collaboration among creative teams.
assumptions: Asana is already integrated in workflows.

options.text: Use Trello to coordinate and track creative projects.
options.why: Visual board system is popular for organizing tasks creatively.
assumptions: Trello is familiar to team members.

options.text: Teams use Google Workspace for document collaboration.
options.why: Google's suite is popular for its real-time collaboration features.
assumptions: Google tools are already in use.
